abstract: Program called Fathers Raising Responsible Men, led by New York University Prof Vincent Guilamo-Ramos in South Bronx, aims to reduce teenage pregnancy and sexually transmitted diseases by encouraging fathers to talk to their sons about sex; program hopes to reach borough's black and Latino families that have been under-served by such efforts.
lead_paragraph: The effort is a new approach to curb sexually transmitted diseases and teenage pregnancies in a borough where the rates of both are high.

headline.main: Bronx Program Encourages Fathers to Talk About Sex
headline.print_headline: Program Battles Ill Effects of Sex by Getting Fathers and Sons to Talk About It

snippet: The effort is a new approach to curb sexually transmitted diseases and teenage pregnancies in a borough where the rates of both are high.
